name: Space Junk Janitor Simulator 2222
description:
The year is 2222. You play as a robot designed to collect space junk with your nifty mechanical claw. Go out into the unknown and attempt to clean up the mess some humans left.

A project we made in four weeks. 

Programming
Lucia Hughes (@LuxiExtra on itch.io)

Art
Nel (@Nelsmell on itch.io)

Design
Robert Niewodowski  (@Bobertone on itch.io)
Sasha Tschernisch (@SashaT18 on itch.io)
Jackson Klein
